problem.markdown: If [mathjaxinline]dz = M dx + N dy[/mathjaxinline] is an exact differential, which of the following are true? [x] [mathjaxinline]M=(\frac{\partial z}{\partial x})_y[/mathjaxinline] [ ] [mathjaxinline]M=(\frac{\partial z}{\partial y})_x[/mathjaxinline] [ ] [mathjaxinline]N=(\frac{\partial z}{\partial x})_y[/mathjaxinline] [x] [mathjaxinline]N=(\frac{\partial z}{\partial y})_x[/mathjaxinline]
problem.p: If [mathjaxinline]dz = M dx + N dy[/mathjaxinline] is an exact differential, which of the following
